title: database/sql: unexpected signal in (*Stmt).Query on Windows - caused by GC?
body:
I've been getting weird fatal errors with Go 1.6.2 when doing queries on a SQLite database. They appear to be nearly completely random and we have not been able to get a case that reproduces it reliably yet, so I'm not sure how help this can provide.

They've been happening when using the https://github.com/mattn/go-sqlite3 package.

Relevant part of the stacktrace - the rest of it is our my code.

```
fatal error: unexpected signal during runtime execution
[signal 0xc0000005 code=0x0 addr=0xffffffffffffffff pc=0x40e8fd]

goroutine 381 [running]:
runtime.throw(0xd1e0c0, 0x2a)
	C:/Go/src/runtime/panic.go:547 +0x97 fp=0xc0839d3d58 sp=0xc0839d3d40
runtime.sigpanic()
	C:/Go/src/runtime/signal_windows.go:155 +0x68 fp=0xc0839d3d80 sp=0xc0839d3d58
runtime.getitab(0xafc840, 0x4057e8, 0xc082011001, 0x0)
	C:/Go/src/runtime/iface.go:83 +0x2ed fp=0xc0839d3e68 sp=0xc0839d3d80
runtime.assertE2I2(0xafc840, 0x4057e8, 0xc0820110e0, 0xc0839d3f30, 0x10)
	C:/Go/src/runtime/iface.go:364 +0x74 fp=0xc0839d3e90 sp=0xc0839d3e68
database/sql/driver.defaultConverter.ConvertValue(0x4057e8, 0xc0820110e0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0)
	C:/Go/src/database/sql/driver/types.go:223 +0xe8 fp=0xc0839d3fe0 sp=0xc0839d3e90
database/sql.driverArgs(0xc0839d42b0, 0xc0832205a8, 0x1, 0x1, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0)
	C:/Go/src/database/sql/convert.go:36 +0x1e8 fp=0xc0839d41a8 sp=0xc0839d3fe0
database/sql.rowsiFromStatement(0x134a340, 0xc0821f93b0, 0x134a2d8, 0xc082948f60, 0xc0832205a8, 0x1, 0x1, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0, ...)
	C:/Go/src/database/sql/sql.go:1648 +0x2db fp=0xc0839d42b0 sp=0xc0839d41a8
database/sql.(*Stmt).Query(0xc082508300, 0xc0832205a8, 0x1, 0x1, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0)
	C:/Go/src/database/sql/sql.go:1611 +0x2bd fp=0xc0839d43d0 sp=0xc0839d42b0
```

go version/env

```
go version go1.6 windows/amd64

set GOARCH=amd64
set GOBIN=
set GOEXE=.exe
set GOHOSTARCH=amd64
set GOHOSTOS=windows
set GOOS=windows
set GOPATH=
set GORACE=
set GOROOT=C:\Go
set GOTOOLDIR=C:\Go\pkg\tool\windows_amd64
set GO15VENDOREXPERIMENT=1
set CC=gcc
set GOGCCFLAGS=-m64 -mthreads -fmessage-length=0
set CXX=g++
set CGO_ENABLED=1
```
